thread.title: ClickSoftware posts 4Q profit - Yahoo Singapore Finance
thread.title_full: ClickSoftware posts 4Q profit - Yahoo Singapore Finance

author: AP
title: ClickSoftware posts 4Q profit - Yahoo Singapore Finance
text:
PETAH TIKVA, Israel (AP) _ ClickSoftware Technologies Ltd. (CKSW) on Wednesday reported fourth-quarter net income of $2.6 million. 
On a per-share basis, the Petah Tikva, Israel-based company said it had profit of 8 cents. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to 11 cents per share. 
The maker of human resources cloud computing software posted revenue of $34.5 million in the period. 
For the year, the company reported that its loss narrowed to $3 million, or 9 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $126.2 million. 
ClickSoftware expects full-year earnings in the range of 9 cents to 15 cents per share, with revenue in the range of $140 million to $145 million. 
ClickSoftware shares have fallen nearly 2 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has decreased 17 percent in the last 12 months.
